entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:15 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 06:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -20.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -23.4°C
Wind: NNW 13 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26 except minus 20 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26 except minus 20 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
